title: VACCINE HOLOCAUST DENIERS today are just as deceived as those who deny the reality of the WWII Holocaust inflicted by the Nazis
cleaned_text:
VACCINE HOLOCAUST DENIERS today are just as deceived as those who deny the reality of the WWII Holocaust inflicted by the Nazis

There is a pandemic still underway across the globe, but it’s not the lab-made Wuhan virus that’s taking people out like flies; it’s the gene mutation jab campaign, also known as Covid “vaccines.” The Holocaust of WWII in Germany lasted from 1933, when Dachau concentration camp opened, until 1945, when Hitler committed suicide and Germany surrendered, ending the Third Reich. That’s over a decade it took to exterminate more than 6 million Jews, among countless others, including people of color, the handicapped, the mentally ill, the elderly, and anyone with autism.

Yet, right now, nearly a million Americans have been killed by the Covid vaccines in just one year, so at this rate, in 12 years, more than DOUBLE the victims of the Holocaust will be dead due to vaccine violence, and that’s just in America. Anyone who denies the Holocaust of WWII happened is labeled a Holocaust denier, who ignores all the facts and witnesses (survivors and escapees), some of which are still living today. Yet we are witnessing new Holocaust deniers right now, during this Vaccine Holocaust, and they are the very people in charge of running the country, the CDC, WHO, and the Mass Media Complex. How can this be?

Every Covid vaccine-induced death is labeled “unknown causes” as the Vaccine Holocaust is covered up while happening, just like the WWII Holocaust

How many people, especially Jews, realized what was happening WHILE it was happening from 1933 to 1945? Who knew that every day over 1,000 people were being exterminated, by gas chamber or two bullets to the back of the head, as part of a genocidal wipeout campaign to reduce the population? Jews were surrendering all of their rights, their possessions, their homes, their safety, their lives to a government that was mass-incarcerating them in ghettos and concentration camps.

Today, hospitals in America are like concentration camps, as people check in ‘voluntarily’ out of fear and “sickness” (oftentimes false PCR tests), but never check out, once they receive vaccines, kidney-decimating Remdesivir, and choke-you-to-death ventilators. Others check out, only to drop dead soon-thereafter from “unknown causes” (heart attacks or strokes from vascular clots caused by nanostructures created by mRNA jabs).

Now, compelling data reveals EXCESS MORTALITY following the introduction of the Fauci Flu jabs just over the past two years, especially in the past 12 months, which includes the ‘booster’ clot shots.

Sooner or later, the vaccine industrial complex will not be able to cover up the Vaccine Holocaust that’s killing more than 2,000 Americans daily

The scientific and medical “communities” are covering up the “elephant in the room” (vaccine-induced SADS) with fake news and propaganda, but for how long will that work? The key players in the scamdemic, who all know the vaccines are the “gas chambers” of the new holocaust, include the talking heads at the very top of their tiers. Yes, the Vaccine holocaust deniers include Biden, Fauci, and the producers, directors, and editors at the top of the Mass Media Complex.

Sadly as it may seem, Covid-19 was just a Litmus test, to see how compliant the USA would be to forced vaccinations (through fear-based coercion and job-reliant threats), lockdowns (the ‘essential businesses only’ lie), masks (bacteria-breeding petri dishes for helping exacerbate false-positive PCR tests), mass surveillance (police-state tyranny for controlling movement, purchases, and bankrupting small businesses), and of course, for fixing elections for the Demoncrats (and globalists) who now run the hospitals, the CDC, the FDA, and all the disinformation that comes with the entire scamdemic.

Now, get ready for the ‘real thing’ — the biological war of all wars. The vaccine apocalypse. The unexplained sudden death tsunami. The end of the Republic. Biden knows. Fauci knows. Obama knows. This is no conspiracy theory. This has been a public service announcement from Natural Health News and the War against Vaccination. We must stop the Vaccine Holocaust. Ban together now.

Bookmark Vaccines.news to your favorite independent websites for updates on experimental gene therapy injections that cause vascular clots, myocarditis, and chronic inflammation.
